alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 03 at 3:27AM EST until March 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches with the highest amounts in northern portions of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Otsego county. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... The snow could mix briefly with sleet at times tonight. Snowfall rates around an inch per hour are expected.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
